overview: After graduating from university and failing to get a job and realize their dreams, the three friends turn to the monument, leading to their imprisonment.  After leaving the prison, he is met by a lawyer who is looking for Hisham al-Salamouni to receive his inheritance from the late Nabila al-Shorbaji, whom he intended to marry despite the age difference between them.Nabila died before the marriage but recommended before her death to her elephant to Hisham, but in return for commitment to some difficult conditions.  They try to meet these conditions in order to keep the villa, and events continue in a comical atmosphere.
